How big is the country? No, seriously, that is a big factor. 
 
Iceland has=
 roughly 11,000 registered domains. It IS possible to crawl that
in one go =
(provided you have decent hardware with lots of disk space -
6-700GB minmum=
), but it will take a month at least (ok, this actually
depends very much o=
n the hardware).
 
In practice we've found it better to segment our crawls =
(current snapshot of
.is is being done in three parts). The segments are be=
ing run sequentially,
but they could be run in parallel to save time (altho=
ugh this would likely
cause problem for us since our bandwidth is limited).=

 
Segmenting the scope can be a challenge. For us, all domains that end wi=
th
.is are within the scope. Each segment is then defined as (second tier
d=
omains) starting from string A to string B (current crawl covers 0.is
throu=
gh hax.is).
 
Unfortunately you can't set up a cluster of machines that dir=
ectly
cooperate. This will hopefully be added in the future.
 
- Kris

 there anyway that we can setup a "cluster" for heritrix, say using

uster for some kind of crawl balancing.  If not, how
